text: aur hamane moosa ko kitaab dee thee, aur usake pashchaat aage-peechhe nirantar rasool bhejate rahe; aur marayam ke bete eesa ko khulee-khulee nishaaniyaan pradaan kee aur pavitr-aatma ke dvaara use shakti pradaan kee; to yahee to hua ki jab bhee koee rasool tumhaare paas vah kuchh lekar aaya jo tumhaare jee ko pasand na tha, to tum akad baithe, to ek giroh ko to tumane jhuthalaaya aur ek giroh ko qatl karate ho
